sn19.16:1.1: “Idhāhaṃ, āvuso, gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṃ asīsakaṃ kabandhaṃ vehāsaṃ gacchantaṃ.
sn19.16:1.2: Tassa ure akkhīni ceva honti mukhañca.
sn19.16:1.3: Tamenaṃ gijjhāpi kākāpi kulalāpi anupatitvā anupatitvā vitacchenti virājenti.
sn19.16:1.5: eso, bhikkhave, satto imasmiṃyeva rājagahe hāriko nāma coraghātako ahosi …pe….
